name: Builder Bros
description:
Can you save the goat from the evil construction workers? You can? Well, who can rescue it the fastest?

Each game starts with a build mode, followed by Play mode. This is intended for 2 Players, each player gets to customize the layout of the tiles, then the other gets to play it. The web upload has the toolbox images disabled.

ASDW to move, Space to jump, Enter to start game.

In Build mode, Q to place blocks, E to remove blocks, Z and C to cycle through items.

Ian Nastajus - Lead Programmer

Sean Browning - Head of Graphics

Matthew Holzapfel - Level Designer, Programmer
